Life Solina - The Royal Archives of Aden:
After three years of ascetic life Solina number of its followers was several thousand, and seven believers, called by her students, enjoyed fame and popular support are second only to the most famous Solina. These students consisted of the most famous and dedicated believers answered a special call Solina.
The names of the most dedicated students: High Priest Anais following the Solin ever since, when she was a princess, the captain of the kingdom Elmoreden - the famous strategist Bost, and following the Solin from the start Eris known as the Nun of Silence, and Kaerun husband - the famous playwright of the kingdom, Judith van ethynyl and his son Etis ethinyl van - known by traders from trade Organization.
